siteMetadata.title: Trafikito - monitor output of any command

markdownRemark.html:
To change your password, you must login to Trafikito client and navigate here: Change password

Just enter the current password, then the new password and click the Save new password button.

If you lost your password and want to recover, use this link: Recover
